name: makersbnb
description: ##  * As a user I would like to sign up for ￼an account and login * As a user I would like to list a new space * ￼As a user I would like to add additional information on my space * As a user I would like to interact with a calendar to show my spaces availability￼￼￼ * As a secondary user I would like to send a notification to a primary user to rent there space￼ * As a primary user I would like to show when my space is unavailable for rent￼ * As a primary user I would like my space to be advertised until I have confirmed a booking ￼￼
